text: Turkmani () is a main and almost a large tribe of Hazara people in Afghanistan. == Origin == They share their history as do some other Hazara tribes, with the people of Central Asia. Historically they have been resided in and around Turkman Valley, which is located in Parwan Province, Hazarajat region, but currently most of them are living in Kabul. They have their own dialect of the Persian language known as Hazaragi.Anita Jacobson-Widding. Identity, personal and socio-cultural: a symposium. Volume 5 of Uppsala studies in cultural anthropology. title: Turkmun (Hazara tribe)
